author: Staff Reporter
text:
Actor dies in mishap

Actor Selvakumar died in a two-wheeler accident on GN Chetty road on Friday night after a brake failure.

Selvakumar and another actor, Kovai Senthil, were travelling by a two-wheeler after attending an event at Narada Gana Sabha. As they sped towards Venkatanarayana road, the brake wires of the motorcycle got entangled in the front wheel, and they fell on the ground.

While Selvakumar suffered a head injury, his friend escaped with minor wounds. “He died before we took him to hospital,” said an officer from Pondy Bazaar police station.

His relatives took his body to Coimbatore, where his family lives. Selvakumar has acted in nearly 300 films, including Anniyan and Ramana and was cast in Singham 3 . He is survived by wife Geetha and two children. — Staff Reporter
title: Actor dies in road accident
